key.name: log-level
key.summary: Provide log4j-like logging levels: 0 - OFF 1 - FATAL 2 - ERROR 3 - WARN 4 - INFO 5 - DEBUG 6 - TRACE 7 - ALL

key.name: cycle-tiled-top
key.description: Snap the focused window to the top of the screen and make it fill the top half. If already in the top half position, resize it to the top third. If already in the top third, resize it to the top two thirds.

key.name: cycle-tiled-bottom
key.description: Snap the focused window to the bottom of the screen and make it fill the bottom half. If already in the bottom half position, resize it to the bottom third. If already in the bottom third, resize it to the bottom two thirds.
